name: one
description: Browser application cache. It guarantees entity uniqueness across the entire cache.

scripts.test: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:js && npm run build:js:min
scripts.prepub: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.covis: istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -u exports --compilers js:babel-register -R spec && open ./coverage/lcov-report/index.html

author: Dan Maier
